articles.title: Hacker Says AT&T Paid About $400,000 to Erase Sensitive Data...
articles.description: A hacker who claims to have stolen sensitive call and text logs from AT&T Inc. said they were paid about $400,000 to erase the data trove.
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) -- A hacker who claims to have stolen sensitive call and text logs from AT&T Inc. said they were paid about $400,000 to erase the data trove.

articles.title: Solana suffers 30% weekly drop as alt-coins hammered in crypto crash
articles.description: Fringe coins are feeling the brunt of the cryptocurrency market's mass liquidations over recent days.
articles.content: With the cryptocurrency market in free fall, the industrys so-called alt-coins are experiencing the sharpest drops. Solana, Link and Uniswap tokens are all down 30% over the past week, according to C… [+3870 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s VP pick JD Vance is first Bitcoin holder on a Presidential ticket
